name: Acme Corp
notes: Great communicator. Prefers Slack for day-to-day, email for formal deliverables. Decision maker — no approval chain needed.

name: Meridian Consulting
notes: Referred by mutual contact. Detail-oriented, appreciates thorough documentation. Prefers email communication with weekly status updates.

name: Pinnacle Labs
notes: Technical founder, speaks developer language. Communicates via GitHub issues and Slack. Wants clean code and good documentation over flashy UI.

name: The Wild Sage
notes: New restaurant opening in March. Enthusiastic but not tech-savvy — needs clear explanations and visual mockups. Referred by The Craft Table project.
